title: Print, "A Shepherd Boy", early 1740s
medium: Hand-colored etching with blue, green, yellow watercolors on paper
inscribed: At bottom left: "A. Peyrotte pin"; at right: "A Lyon chez Pariset" [very faint]; "Francois Sc."
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Seated on the ground, at right, before a palm tree and fantastic plants. Two sheep at center. Two women stroll before a castle in the left background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "A Shepherd Boy", early 1740s.
early 1740s. Hand-colored etching with blue, green, yellow watercolors on paper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1921-22-260.
